Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Luann Jurski
Reviews.Content: Was shopping for a small TV for the kitchen & since it's made in USA & also recommended by the salesman, I bought it. I am now looking for another one & this will go in my yard sale.  The picture is always distorted, no matter the mode.  The tops of heads are cut off & any print at the bottom of the screen, is also partially cut off. The sound is a bit "grainy".  On some stations, the picture is so dark that I virtually can't watch it. Adjusting brightness, etc. does nothing to help. This is very poor in every aspect & a great disappointment for a Made in USA TV. A complete waste of money.
